resources.string:
Why one is not allowed to be a donor before attaining the age of 18 years?
Physiologically there is no harm in donating blood in the early age. The reason is legal, 18 being the age of consent in our country.

What if the person from which I want blood has already donated blood in recently passes days?
we are providing the previous date of donation of the donor. So if he has donated blood in the passed three months and no other donor is available of same blood type ,then u can contact to other blood bank whose details are mentioned in our app.

Why three months interval has been stipulated though donated blood is recuperated within 28 days?
As an additional precautionary measure for safety of donor.

Is any medical history checked before registering the person as a blood donor?
ctually any person who wish to donate blood can register as a donor to our app. As soon as he becomes a donor ,we verify that he is not suffering with any serious disease (malaria,jaundice, HIV) from his medical records from our blood bank.
